content:
The latest version of the reference client is tagged v0.1.0
https://github.com/nightingaleproject/Reference-Client-API/tree/v0.1.0
Fixes include

  • improved logging
  • fixed persistent timestamp bug that failed to load the saved timestamp from the last GET request to the server
  • fixed a query that inadvertently selected coded messages for resend
  • updated the resend interval to 4 hours (more appropriate interval for testing against the development server)
